Package core

Class FileWriterService

java.lang.Object
core.FileWriterService
public class FileWriterService
extends java.lang.Object
The FileWriterService will write the result of the comparisons to a file . It can create a file, write to an existing file or overwrite an already existing file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FileWriterService()
    FileWriterService will write to the path ""
    FileWriterService​(java.lang.String path)
    FileWriterService will write to the given path

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void write​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String text, boolean overwrite, boolean append)
    This method will write the given string to the file with the given name at the path location.
    void writeConfig​(java.lang.String filename, Config config)
    writes a Config object to a file

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • FileWriterService

      public FileWriterService​(java.lang.String path)
      FileWriterService will write to the given path
      Parameters:
      path - used to decide where to write or find the file

    • FileWriterService

      public FileWriterService()
      FileWriterService will write to the path ""

  • Method Details

    • write

      public void write​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String text, boolean overwrite, boolean append) throws java.io.IOException
      This method will write the given string to the file with the given name at the path location. It can create a new file, overwrite an existing file or append to an already existing file.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the file
      text - the text to be written to the file
      overwrite - boolean deciding if the FileWriterService should overwrite a file with the same name
      append - boolean deciding if the text should be appended to a present file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • writeConfig

      public void writeConfig​(java.lang.String filename, Config config) throws java.io.IOException
      writes a Config object to a file
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to write to
      config - the Config object to write to file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when there is an error with the FileWriter
